product.description: Average rating from customers

product.name: Product rating count
product.description: Total number of ratings from customers

product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products
product.description: List of related products

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Complementary products
product.description: List of complementary products

product.description: Set date and time countdown start at

product.name: Google: Custom Product
product.description: Use to indicate whether or not the unique product identifiers (UPIs) GTIN, MPN, and brand are available for your product.

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Shape
product.description: Describes the geometric form or shape of a product, such as round or heart

product.name: Toilet shape
product.description: Describes the form of a toilet, such as round or rectangular

product.name: Toilet mounting type
product.description: Specifies the method of toilet installation, e.g. wall-mounted, floor-mounted

product.name: Flush system
product.description: Specifies the flush system used in plumbing fixtures, such as single or double

product.name: Material
product.description: Defines a product's primary material, such as cotton or wool

product.name: Hardware material
product.description: Specifies the composition of hardware items, such as metal or stainless steel

product.name: Toilet cover design
product.description: Describes the shape of toilet covers, such as round or elongated

product.name: Toilet cover features
product.description: Describes the special characteristics of a toilet cover, like quick release or soft-close

product.name: Sink shape
product.description: Defines the geometric design of sinks, such as oval or rectangular

product.name: Sink type
product.description: Specifies the design of kitchen or utility sinks, such as half bowl

product.name: Urinal mounting type
product.description: Specifies how a urinal is installed, such as wall-mounted or floor-mounted

product.name: Bathtub features
product.description: Identifies unique features of a bathtub, such as overflow protection or whirlpool

product.name: Drain location
product.description: Specifies the drain placement in bathtubs or showers,such as center or left

product.name: Shower design
product.description: Identifies the configuration of shower stalls & kits, such as alcove or corner

product.name: Shower features
product.description: Describes the unique elements of a shower, such as a built-in seat or handheld shower

product.name: Connecting thread
product.description: Specifies the thread type for joining plumbing parts, e.g. 1/2 inch IPS

product.name: Light color
product.description: Defines the color or hue of light, such as white or multicolor

product.name: Furniture/Fixture material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in furniture or fixtures, like wood or metal

product.name: Sink mounting type
product.description: Specifies the installation method for sinks, e.g. counter, wall-hung

product.name: Mounting type
product.description: Specifies how a product is installed or attached, such as clip-on or suction cup

product.name: Suitable space
product.description: Defines the ideal location for product use, e.g. indoors, above ground

product.name: Style
product.description: Describes the style of a product, typically for window treatments; e.g. vertical blind, pleated shades

product.name: Suitable location
product.description: Indicates the ideal placement for the product in the home, e.g. bedroom, patio

product.name: canadian
product.description: Is the product Vendor is Canadian, does the Manufactory based in Canada?

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 0
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns

variant.name: Google: Size System
variant.description: The country of the size system used by your product.

variant.name: Google: Gender
variant.description: The gender for which your product is intended.

variant.name: Google: Condition
variant.description: The condition of your product at time of sale.

variant.name: Google: Age Group
variant.description: The demographic for which your product is intended.
